mapper.select: SELECT sa.authority_url,sra.role_id FROM sys_role_authorities sra LEFT JOIN sys_authorities sa ON sra.authority_id = sa.authority_id WHERE sa.is_valid='Y'

SELECT su.user_id,su.user_name,su.user_password, sr.role_id,sr.role_name, sa.authority_id,sa.authority_name,sa.authority_type,sa.authority_url, sa.parent_authority_id,sa.authority_flag,sa.authority_level,disp_order FROM sys_users su, sys_users_roles sur, sys_roles sr, sys_authorities sa, sys_role_authorities sra WHERE su.user_id=sur.user_id AND sur.role_id=sr.role_id AND sur.role_id=sra.role_id AND sra.authority_id=sa.authority_id AND sa.is_valid='Y' AND sa.is_show='Y' AND su.user_account=#{userAccount}
